Specific Details: Irish Deaf Society (IDS) have submitted a pre-budget application for core funding from the governemnt as we never got one in the past.

Specific Details: Carol Moore emailed Mark Daly regarding his nomination in the Seanad. Discussions were had on the potential for the IKA to nominate Mark Daly for Seanad. Contact was made on 4/9/2024 and 16/9/2024
Subject Matter: Carol Moore emailed Mark Daly regarding his nomination in the Seanad. Discussions were had on the potential for the IKA to nominate Mark Daly for Seanad. Contact was made on 4/9/2024 and 16/9/2024
Intended Results: Carol Moore emailed Mark Daly for paperwork for nominations to be discussed with the board at their meeting on 26/9/2024. Mark Daly to send paperwork on 17th which was received on 18th September via Grace Marks Secretary. The result intended is the IKA board of Directors will nominate Mark Daly for Seanad.
Lobbying Activities: Carol Moore and Mark Daly exchanged emails, phone calls and voice notes. |Email|11-20
